func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression

func_sig.description: Solves for a missing side of a right triangle using the Pythagorean Theorem or verifies if the given sides form a right triangle.
func_sig.name: solve_pythagorean_theorem

a.description: The length of one side of the triangle.

b.description: The length of the other side of the triangle.

c.description: The length of the hypotenuse or third side of the triangle. If provided, the function will verify whether a, b, and c form a Pythagorean triple.

func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in any dimension.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance

point1.description: The first point as an array of coordinates.

point2.description: The second point as an array of coordinates.
